Class PodcastBlock

java.lang.Object
com.apptasticsoftware.rssreader.module.podcast.PodcastBlock
public class PodcastBlock extends Object
Represents the podcast:block element that allows podcasters to control platform access to their feed. This element determines which platforms are allowed to publicly display the feed and its contents. It serves as a more flexible replacement for the itunes:block tag.

      public PodcastBlock()

  • Method Details

    • isBlock

      public boolean isBlock()
      Returns the block status. When true, indicates that the feed should be blocked from ingestion. The value corresponds to "yes" (true) or "no" (false) in the XML.
      Returns:
      true if the feed should be blocked, false otherwise

    • setBlock

      public void setBlock(boolean block)
      Sets the block status.
      Parameters:
      block - true to block ingestion ("yes"), false to allow it ("no")

    • getId

      public Optional<String> getId()
      Gets the platform identifier (slug) that this block rule applies to. When not present, the block rule applies to all platforms.
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the platform identifier, or empty if no specific platform is targeted

    • setId

      public void setId(String id)
      Sets the platform identifier (slug) that this block rule applies to.
      Parameters:
      id - the platform identifier from the service slug list

      public boolean equals(Object o)
